message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper proposes an algorithm for event classification in basketball videos using optical flow, sequential CNNs, LSTM networks, and deep features of images. These techniques are commonly used in computer vision and machine learning, indicating that the paper is likely to belong to the computer vision (cs.CV) and multimedia (cs.MM) sub-categories. Additionally, the use of ontology-based patterns suggests that the paper may also belong to the artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category. The use of deep learning techniques such as CNNs and LSTMs further supports the possibility of the paper belonging to the machine learning (cs.LG) sub-category. Finally, the use of post-event segments to predict success/failure suggests that the paper may also belong to the information retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category.
